title: Sensations
description: TV reporter Jennifer Thompson's latest assignment for News 4 Tulsa could turn her world upside down--she's investigating an underground BDSM club in the Oklahoma city! Will she finally be able to break through the wall her photographer, Paul Larsen, has kept between them all this time? Will this end their relationship or take it to a whole new level?Find out in a story hotter than an Oklahoma summer night!(Release date: October 20, 2014)
author: K.B. Gardener
